reviewText: this film is a cult classic that can't be missed and truly preserves the quality of vintage classic film.  It is action packed, and warrants itself as a true icon of the genre. Jamie Gillis's performance is outstanding! I have been a fan for years and have seen hundreds of classic films, but Waterpower has really stood out, probably the best and most outrageous one, I've ever seen. The girls are incredible looking and the action is amazing.  I really loved it, it's everything my friends told me it was going to be.  I recommend this film for anyone who likes a truly well done classic film.

EDITED VERSION!!!
while some of the expulsion scenes remain a lot of the really sick stuff is cut. this version was completely butchered. over 20 minutes of footage is missing. i recommend looking for the Alpha Blue or Alpha France versions as those are the most complete. Alpha France has better image quality but is still cut by a lot, Alpha Blue has almost all the scenes intact but image quality is not as great (a fair trade off in my opinion)

STAY AWAY FROM THIS VERSION
A weird movie. I thought it was a horror film but its pretty much a porno. That isn't a joke. it's really just hardcore porn...
Very much let down by this film! 22 minutes were cut from it and the movie was totally spoiled! its not what they mentioned in their ads for the film. Don't buy it!
it is missing several of the more intense scenes. Plus I had to return the first, it wouldnt play, someone probably recorded it on their home dvd recorder

With that said, this film dares to expose the underbelly of human society and how we really are behind closed doors.  Either my mind has twisted, or this is the most important film ever made and is long overdue and in dire need of a blu-ray collector's edition.  Include both the American edited version and the French International version.  I think what makes this film work so well is the idea of it was laid out like a slasher/horror body count film.  Anyone who's anyone needs to see this film.

This is an infamous roughie, considered a real classic, and deservedly so. The cinematography is way above average, the subject matter is still not one for the squeamish, and Jamie G. is a sick man - and it comes through very realistically in this film. C.J. with the apple in her mouth is a beautiful thing. It's pretty awesome that Amazon has this, BUT - buyer beware, this is the edited version. It's still got plenty of stuff to make the straights run away and some pervs squirm, but between the obvious fades + if you've done your internet homework, you'll know some of the hardest stuff is cut in this version. So boo hiss on that.
